General.Name: Xiamen Port Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Port Development Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides bulk cargo terminal loading and unloading, and integrated logistics services in China. The company also offers bulk cargo handling, shipping agency, LCL, tally notary, warehousing, transportation, sea-rail combined transportation, land ports, and other port logistics services, as well as cargo transportation agency, transportation cargo packaging, general cargo warehousing, grain and oil storage, and supply chain management services. In addition, it is involved in sale of metal materials, high-performance non-ferrous metals and alloy materials, metal ores, needles, coal and building materials, cement and chemical products, non-metallic minerals, mechanical equipment and electronic products, electrical equipment, textiles and raw materials, and agricultural and sideline products; and trading of coal, grains, steels, and other bulk commodities. Further, the company engages in the tugboat business; wholesale of hardware products, clothing's, daily necessities, stationeries, sporting goods and equipment, and handicrafts and collectibles; and non-residential real estate leasing and housing rental activities. Xiamen Port Development Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Xiamen Road and Bridge Corporation and changed its name to Xiamen Port Development Co., Ltd. in November 2004. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Xiamen, China. Xiamen Port Development Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xiamen International Port Co., Ltd.

7.Name: Ms. Yirong  Zhou
